channel.title: johnjohnston tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from johnjohnston.

item.description: @howard_nt I have, thanks, quiet. And of course too short;-) Hope you are well
item.source:markdown: @howard_nt I have, thanks, quiet. And of course too short;-) Hope you are well

item.description: I had a warm short walk around the Kilpatrick braes this afternoon. Quite a few butterflies about including this Small Copper. https://t.co/moTHJ16IZx
item.source:markdown: I had a warm short walk around the Kilpatrick braes this afternoon. Quite a few butterflies about including this Small Copper. https://t.co/moTHJ16IZx

item.description: Went to Kelvingrove Bandstand to see King Creosote perform "From Scotland with Love" alongside the archive footage. Perfect weather. Lovely night, such an impressive mix. Thanks to @cmdjohnston & @MTImmonsMusic for taking me along. https://t.co/6RkmOhHzzZ
item.source:markdown: Went to Kelvingrove Bandstand to see King Creosote perform "From Scotland with Love" alongside the archive footage. Perfect weather. Lovely night, such an impressive mix. Thanks to @cmdjohnston & @MTImmonsMusic for taking me along. https://t.co/6RkmOhHzzZ

item.description: @ds106dc #tdc3861 #ds106 #myFest22 my desktop raven, crossing the pale blue background; beyond the finder. the wallpaper rotation calls me, loch, hills, the quick running burn. https://t.co/YYzymlPlaD
